about.title: About Tejo-Beauty
about.fullText: Tejo-Beauty is a brand that defines a new level of beauty standards. Our focus is expertise, quality and experience â€” for end users and beauty professionals. Our philosophy is based on the availability of highly effective products that meet the highest aesthetic and functional criteria. Whether you are curating your own beauty corner or equipping a salon, Tejo-Beauty is the place where expertise and style become one.
